author: Chelsea Peng
title: What to Buy at Nordstrom - Trump Nordstrom Drops Ivanka Line
text:
view gallery 10 Photos 
Nobody really needs a *reason* to shop, especially not when there are cool orthopedic sneakers and peekaboo Marques Almeida skirts to be hadâ€”all in one place, no less. But if you did have a compelling motivation to spend your money at Nordstrom (can't imagine what that could be ) that's swell too. Ahead, our top 10 suggestions. More
